me.robertlit.wireless.api.component.inventory

Interface WirelessComponentInventoryWidget<T extends WirelessComponent>


  • @ApiStatus.OverrideOnly
public interface WirelessComponentInventoryWidget<T extends WirelessComponent>
    Represents a widget that can be added to a WirelessComponent's control inventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplayItem(T component)
      This method should be overridden and return the item that should be displayed in the control inventory of the given component.
      @NotNull String getIdentifier()
      This method should be overridden and return a constant unique identifier for this widget.
      void handleClick(T component, @NotNull org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      This method should be overridden and handle a click on this widgets display item.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayItem

        @NotNull
@NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplayItem(@NotNull
                                                                 T component)
        This method should be overridden and return the item that should be displayed in the control inventory of the given component.

        This method is called every time the inventory is opened or this widget is clicked, meaning that it supports different items based on the given component's current state.

        Parameters:
        component - the component in whose control inventory this display item is currently acquired
        Returns:
        the item to display in the given component's control inventory

      • handleClick

        void handleClick(@NotNull
                 T component,
                 @NotNull
                 @NotNull org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        This method should be overridden and handle a click on this widgets display item.

        Opening external inventories should be delayed by a tick, using BukkitScheduler.runTask(Plugin, Runnable)

        This method being called means that the clicked item is this widget's display item, there is no need to check for that.

        The method InventoryClickEvent.setCurrentItem(ItemStack) is not supported, and will be overridden by the item returned from getDisplayItem(WirelessComponent).

        Using the methods InventoryInteractEvent.setCancelled(boolean)} and InventoryInteractEvent.setResult(Event.Result) has no effect, the event will be cancelled regardless.

        Parameters:
        component - the component in whose control inventory this widget's display item was clicked
        event - the event causing this method to be called

      • getIdentifier

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getIdentifier()
        This method should be overridden and return a constant unique identifier for this widget.

        The recommended format is (plugin name)_(widget name) in lower case.

        Returns:
        a constant unique identifier for this widget
